Title: Allows defendants to respond to appearance tickets for certain local violations by mail
Summary: Allows defendants to respond to appearance tickets for certain local violations, including a violation of a local zoning ordinance or local zoning law or of a building or sanitation code, by mail and establishes procedures for such plea by mail.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to allowing defendants to respond to appearance tickets for certain local violations by mail
